name: Happy Birthday Robot Ivan
description:
We made Ivan/Nothke (@Nothke) a birthday game in 5 minutes at 23:55 on the eve of his birthday. We missed our deadline.

Ivan did, however, request we submit it to the 2016 #MakeSomethingHorrible jam, we couldn't refuse the birthday boy's wishes

15 min shader and integration - Richard "raxterbaxter" Baxter

15 min particle effects & texturing - Adrian "AdrianTingHus" Tingstad Husby

15 min (+cheating time) music - Martin "MartinKvale" Kvale

Instructions: pressing anything does a thing. end.
